duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute training materials for Oracle Federal Financials R12, including eLearning content and functional user training sessions.
Analyze and support the functional team in designing and documenting system business processes for Oracle-based knowledge support.
Conduct training sessions for end users in a virtual and/or in-person setting, ensuring active participation and engagement.
Manage the training material creation process, mapping business processes, benefits, and change impacts on course content.
Provide support to the Organizational Change Management team in preparation for go-live, including coordinating and executing training sessions with the customer base.
Participate in and support UAT and testing efforts, in conjunction with the functional and technical support counterparts.
Show proficiency in written communication skills and relationship building with client counterparts and the customer base.
Develop and execute training and change initiatives to enable a successful transition to the target state, including developing metrics to measure transition and determine appropriate actions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent related experience
